Posted By: T206Collector
SOLD

Hayden - Quite poor, but in tact Polar bear back - 
Hartsel - SC 350 back with no paper loss - 
Herzog (BOS) - Polar Bear - Clean card, no creases or paper loss - 
Herzog (NY) - Piedmont 150 - No paper loss, has creasing and some staining - 

Front scans below -- I don't have back scans at the moment.  Email SignedT206@gmail.com if interested.
